> > > > > > is
> =

connected to

mula above. We need linear outputs, and maybe

sent
> > > > the

main
>=

> > > > > > > frames has to be connected to 2 linear =

> > > > to

curs in each.

nce the weights of the
> > > > > > connections
> > > > > > > can be thought=
 of as scalars of the coordinate frames.

at were the 3 main transformations.. :)

s hard to evolve.. And using linear
